allocate_large_memory.description: Allocate large amounts of memory without consuming much gas

cpu_loop.description: Infinite loop to burn cpu cycles (only run when metering is enabled)

memory_loop.description: Infinite loop reading and writing memory

message_loop.description: Infinite loop sending message to itself

panic.description: Trigger a panic to ensure framework handles gracefully

release.description: Releasing all funds in the contract to the beneficiary. This is the only "proper" action of this demo contract.

storage_loop.description: Infinite loop making storage calls (to test when their limit hits)

user_errors_in_api_calls.description:
Starting with CosmWasm 0.10, some API calls return user errors back to the contract.
This triggers such user errors, ensuring the transaction does not fail in the backend.
